overview:
Andrew Cox, the original idealist behind ClassWave, can be found day trading during the early hours of the morning in-between reading lengthy Ruby on Rails framework documentation and developing ClassWave by night.

Since 2003 Andrew has been fiddling with JavaScript and developing handy sites in HTML & CSS. While enrolled at college he began to move away from purely front-end development with PHP and Ruby on Rails.
